summary: This document is a series of daily assignment rosters for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, covering dates in July and August 2019. It details staff post assignments, shift changes, leave statuses (sick, annual, LWOP), and overtime/comptime occurrences. The rosters are standard prison administrative records from the period when Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated there. This document is a staff assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, covering August 9-10, 2019. It details officer posts, shift changes, overtime, sick leave, and other staffing adjustments. The document is significant as it provides a detailed operational log of the correctional facility's staffing during the period when Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated there.

locations: MCC New York, New York, NY
keyFacts: The document contains internal Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) staff assignment rosters for dates in July and August 2019.
Rosters detail specific posts (e.g., SHU, CONTROL, LOBBY, SUICIDE WATCH), shift times, and staff leave statuses (Sick, Annual, LWOP, AWOL).
Multiple supervisors (KS, RW, MR, JD, etc.) are recorded as authorizing shift changes and leave statuses.
A 'Suicide Watch' post is listed on the roster for Tuesday, July 23, 2019, with hours from 01:30 to 08:00.
The rosters are standard administrative prison documents and do not mention any inmates, including Jeffrey Epstein, by name.
The document is a detailed staff assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York for August 9-10, 2019.
It logs numerous shift changes, overtime authorizations, sick leave, annual leave, and AWOL/LWOP statuses for correctional officers.
The roster includes posts such as SHU (Special Housing Unit), CONTROL, INTERNAL, ATTY CONF (Attorney Conference), DRY CELL, and ESCORT, indicating standard and high-security operations.
The document provides a snapshot of the facility's operational staffing during the period Jeffrey Epstein was held there prior to his death.
Multiple staff members (RW, JD, DM, CP, MC, SJ, KS, GA, TD, CM, FtW) are recorded as authorizing or making changes to the roster.
